channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- 3rd Gen AMD EPYC™
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- 3rd Gen AMD EPYC™

item.title: CVE-2021-26323|2024-08-03T20:19:20.475Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: Failure to validate SEV Commands while SNP is active may result in a potential impact to memory integrity.

item.title: CVE-2021-26327|2024-08-03T20:19:20.137Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: Insufficient validation of guest context in the SNP Firmware could lead to a potential loss of guest confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2021-26324|2024-08-03T20:19:20.327Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: A bug with the SEV-ES TMR may lead to a potential loss of memory integrity for SNP-active VMs.

item.title: CVE-2021-26332|2024-08-03T20:26:23.907Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: Failure to verify SEV-ES TMR is not in MMIO space, SEV-ES FW could result in a potential loss of integrity or availability.

item.title: CVE-2022-23818|2024-08-03T03:51:46.083Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: Insufficient input validation on the model specific register: VM_HSAVE_PA may potentially lead to loss of SEV-SNP guest memory integrity.

item.title: CVE-2021-26397|2024-08-03T20:26:25.294Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: Insufficient address validation, may allow an attacker with a compromised ABL and UApp to corrupt sensitive memory locations potentially resulting in a loss of integrity or availability.

item.title: CVE-2021-26326|2024-08-03T20:19:20.339Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: Failure to validate VM_HSAVE_PA during SNP_INIT may result in a loss of memory integrity.

item.title: CVE-2021-26315|2024-08-03T20:19:20.391Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: When the AMD Platform Security Processor (PSP) boot rom loads, authenticates, and subsequently decrypts an encrypted FW, due to insufficient verification of the integrity of decrypted image, arbitrary code may be executed in the PSP when encrypted firmware images are used.

item.title: CVE-2021-26325|2024-08-03T20:19:20.230Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: Insufficient input validation in the SNP_GUEST_REQUEST command may lead to a potential data abort error and a denial of service.
